Class BaseEnemy

java.lang.Object
logic.components.BaseEntity
logic.components.enemies.BaseEnemy
Direct Known Subclasses:
BossEnemy, BossWitchEnemy, FastEnemy, FastWitchEnemy, NormalEnemy, NormalWitchEnemy
public class BaseEnemy extends BaseEntity
The fundamental class for all enemies. Handles pathfinding along the grid, movement physics, taking damage, and applying status effects like Slows.

  • Method Details

    • render

      public void render(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
      Specified by:
      render in class BaseEntity

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage(int amount)
      Reduces health. If health drops to 0, starts the death animation timer.

    • isDead

      public boolean isDead()
      Checks if the enemy is fully dead and ready for removal. return true only if HP invalid input: '<'= 0 AND the death animation has finished playing.

    • applySlow

      public void applySlow()
      Applies a slow debuff to the enemy. Halves the movement speed for 1 second. Resets the timer if applied again.

    • moveBy

      public void moveBy(int dRow, int dCol)
      Updates the enemy's position towards the current target node. Handles speed calculations, slow expiration, and waypoint switching.

    • drawHealthBar

      protected void drawHealthBar(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
      Renders a health bar above the enemy. Uses Deep Pink for enemies to distinguish from other bars.

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition(int row, int col)
      Description copied from class: BaseEntity
      Updates the entity's position based on grid coordinates. Automatically converts grid index to pixel position based on TILE_SIZE.
